channel.title: Bugs / Troubleshooting
channel.description: Report bugs or technical issues with Defence Alliance 2.

item.title: Rocketeers issue and pistol glitch
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ownzbr)
item.dc:creator: Ownzbr
item.content:encoded:
Hello there , its my first post, i play DA 2 (obviously)

i found some bugs when playing as a rocketeers :

When i fire some rockets , then reload, and if i just change to another weapon while reloading the rocket (note that animation isnt complete donE)
i cant fire my Smg (submachine gun)
even if i try to re-reload my SMG or rocket ...i have to die to fire anything again

and sometimes the rocket glitch itself and also cant fire

now the pistol glitch :

many people may now...

Rocketeers issue and pistol glitch

item.title: Weapon issues
item.author: invalid@example.com (Skutarth)
item.dc:creator: Skutarth
item.content:encoded:
I don't know if this has been mentioned, but there are issues with not being able to throw grenades or reload for a short time after you switch to a weapon with an empty clip. If you run out of ammo for a weapon and switch weapon, when you switch your weapon back there will be a delay approximately the length of reloading for the weapon before you can throw a grenade or actually reload.

P.S. I love the art and art direction in the mod. It definitely compliments the gameplay and style of...

Weapon issues

item.title: Bugs bugs bugs ;)
item.author: invalid@example.com (rich_zap)
item.dc:creator: rich_zap
item.content:encoded:
Got a few bugs to list:

First and foremost the plasma bug. Im sure you guys know about this but plasma for defenders can seriously ruin a map...

Second i dont know if this has been noted but there are a fair few collision problems in Egypt. I see a lot of people getting stuck and falling through the map etc... I think that using blocking volumes would be wise.

Third is DA-Siege, attackers can plant plasma behind the wall of the objective and as such do not need to enter the base at...

Bugs bugs bugs

i know i saw this for 1.0 so im wondering. i play AA a ton so im fimilar with INI if u could just tell me why its CE <-- critical erroring me that would be awsome.

this is also...

DA2 wont start

item.title: Having a hard time (re)building as Mechanic
item.author: invalid@example.com (zeep)
item.dc:creator: zeep
item.content:encoded:
Somehow i can't manage to 'lock in' to the sweet spot where building begins. I open the build menu, select a turret, it spawns, then i have to move around and look up & down until i finally begin to build. Sometimes it starts when i crouch and look up, other times it only works when i stand half into the turret.. I'm confused.

Is there a tactic i don't know about?

item.title: A couple of Beta 1.5
item.author: invalid@example.com (_Lynx)
item.dc:creator: _Lynx
item.content:encoded:
A couple of bugs in Beta 1.5

- When the gameplay ends, game doesn't make any attempts to load the next map - have to click forfeit (offline).

On the Outpost 5, when you go to the second objective (the switch) when you're about 20-30 meters to it to the left of will be concrete wall where you can walk into and may be even fall out of the map - didn't get too far.

item.title: Need Example Linux Server Startup
item.author: invalid@example.com (diablobreaux)
item.dc:creator: diablobreaux
item.content:encoded:
Can anyone post an example server startup command?

I'm erroring out with:
./ucc-bin server DA2-LastHope.ut2 -mod=DA2

I assume the gametype (or something else) is missing.

Thanks

item.content:encoded:

Does anyone else see them?

item.title: Crouching with infantry
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kharnellius)
item.dc:creator: Kharnellius
item.content:encoded:
[DA2 v1.0.0] BUG: Crouching with infantry

(EDIT: Sorry this should probably be in the Bugs forum. If an admin wants to move it I'd appreciate as it won't let me delete the thread. Thanks.)

Has anyone else noticed an issue with crouching when play as an infantry?

My guy crouches but not nearly as far as the other classes crouch. It's like he goes down a few inches and thats about it.

The weird thing is if you use the scope it seems like you can crouch completely again after...

Crouching with infantry

item.title: DA2 doesn't work, missing multiple texture files....
item.author: invalid@example.com (Klasnic_E)
item.dc:creator: Klasnic_E
item.content:encoded: I just installed DA2, and i was in the proggress of playing it, when it tells me there missing texture files, i re-downloaded it again and this problem still occurs. One of the missing files i remember is Cass something, plus more for the levels.

item.title: UT 99 RUnning
item.author: invalid@example.com (-=STFU=-Stephanie)
item.dc:creator: -=STFU=-Stephanie
item.content:encoded:
Ok i have a problem with my Ut i just got anew computer put a fresh install on my computer of UT 99. When i went to go open it i ran super fast .. after about 15 seconds i had major lag as if it were trying to catch up. Also when i run i hear a lot of foot steps. I have sence uninstalled and reinstalled serverl times and still the same. I also went as far to change my Unrealtournament file in my system folder to unrealtournament.exe=cpu1600 or something along thoes lines and it worked !! But...

UT 99 RUnning

item.title: Crouching and fixing/building
item.author: invalid@example.com (heron)
item.dc:creator: heron
item.content:encoded:
Not entirely sure if this is a bug or something I'm doing wrong, so I didn't want to officially report it until we'd talked about it here. I also apologise for the crappy names; I'm tired and I can't remember them all

If I'm a Mechanic and want to build/repair a (MG) Turret, I can crouch and do so. It's not a problem. However once finished building and I stand/once the building is complete, I automatically switch to shotgun (I quite often have the pistol in hand as a mechanic).

The...

Crouching and fixing/building

item.title: [DA2 v1.0.0] Upside down guns
item.author: invalid@example.com (MozTS)
item.dc:creator: MozTS
item.content:encoded:
WOOP WOOP WOOP

I happened when I played on offline game, I went into Iron sight mode and this happened.

I didnt get a screen but on all the screens on the weapons they were backwards.

item.title: Wierd Display Issues after Ingame Resolution Change
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lucian04)
item.dc:creator: Lucian04
item.content:encoded:
I had lowered my resolution to 1024x768 on Black Gold with 31 bots so I could maintain my high framerate while keeping my graphical settings maxed out (I usually play at 1280x800 16:10 or 1280x960 4:3)

The next map on my list was DA2 Jungle Classic or whatever it's called. Half way through the match I wanted to take some screenshots of my crazy turret setup that was completey pwning the opposition (Adept Bots) thanks to my crazy repairing skillz and smart "Hold Position" bot placing....

Wierd Display Issues after Ingame Resolution Change

item.title: [DA2 v1.0.0] Map bug - Refinery
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blaaguuu)
item.dc:creator: Blaaguuu
item.content:encoded:
noticed a problem on the map, where you can easily get stuck in a spot taht is very difficult to get out of.

its right near the first objective, if you go up the hill tot he side of the wall taht protects the objective, get ontop of the wall, and go to the opposite end, you can fall into a hole...

attached is a screenshot of the location.

item.title: Transparentcy issues
item.author: invalid@example.com (Defiant)
item.dc:creator: Defiant
item.content:encoded:
I know this has been brought up before and I have already read the faqs. However there is a transparentcy bug on the unexpected map. I haven't found it on any other map but this one. At first when I read all the info before playing the first thing I thought of was sniper. But after talking with the person who was nice enough to greet me to the server. I found out he was a mechanic. Everytime I killed him he would come back running at me shooting and being transparent. That is most assuredly...

Transparentcy issues

item.title: PROBLEMS WITH SCOPE!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Silverslashwolf)
item.dc:creator: Silverslashwolf
item.content:encoded: so when i'm zoomed in all i can see are puke colored bubbles...when im zoomed out the scope lense is covered with puke colored bubbles. what the heck is with that?
